channel.title: intellij on SeleniumHQ Browser Automation
channel.description: Recent content in intellij on SeleniumHQ Browser Automation

item.title: IntelliJ
item.description: Every year, Jetbrains are kind enough to donate an OSS license for IntelliJ to the Selenium project. As part of that process, they’ve asked that we review the product and (kudos to them!) have been clear that they hope we’re open and honest. So, I’ll be open and honest. When I tell people that I’m a professional Java developer, people in some circles make sympathetic noises and (sometimes) jokingly refer to how painful my coding life must be.
